notes.text: Hello. You can add, save, delete, zoom in and zoom out  Notes.
Please note: Changes are faked and aren't persisted.
You can choose different colors. This option is only available once clicked on the Note.

Enjoy the code. I used Class component for Container component and Functional components for Presentational components. This App does not concern about styling. However, I used styled-components library to style the App.
